participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

NKISES_01A.Description: Conversion of highest grade completed to Hollingshead Education Code based on Look up tables in Hollingshead, 1975.

Levels.5: 5-Partial college (at least one year or specialized training)

NKISES_02A.Description: Conversion of highest job title/description to Hollingshead Occupational Code based on look up tables in Hollingshead, 1975.

Levels.9: 9-Higher executive; proprietor of large businesses, major professional
Levels.8: 8-Administrators, lesser professionals, proprietor of medium-sized business
Levels.7: 7-Smaller business owners, farm owners, managers, minor professionals
Levels.6: 6-Technicians, semi-professionals, small business owners (business valued at  $50,000-70,000)
Levels.5: 5-Clerical and sales workers, small farm and business owners (business valued at $25,000-50,000)
Levels.4: 4-Smaller business owners (< $25,000), skilled manual laborers, craftsman, tenant farmers
Levels.1: 1-Farm laborers, menial service workers, students, housewives (dependent on welfare, no regular occupation)

NKISES_09.Description: ([(Volunteer Occupational Code x 5) + (Volunteer Education Code x 3)] + [(Spouse/Significant Other Occupational Code x5) + (Spouse/Significant Other Education Code x 3)])/2

NKISES_10.Description: ([(Maternal/Guardian #1 Occupational Code x 5) + (Maternal/Guardian #1  Education Code x 3)] + [(Paternal/Guardian #2 Occupational Code x 5) + (Paternal/Guardian #2 Code x 3)])/2
